rows.label: qev015103_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ah, it's so nice to finally meet you. My name is
the Blood Lobster. Yours is [ST:playername ].
There. Now we're old friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0002
rows.name:
I'm so very impressed with all your hard work.
And as a special treat, I'll answer one question of
yours right here, right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev015103_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask his true identity.

rows.label: qev015103_JNK0020
rows.name: Demand

rows.label: qev015103_SEL0021
rows.name: Insist on knowing why he did all this.

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0003
rows.name: Well, you may find this shocking, but I am...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0004
rows.name: YOUR FATHER![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0005
rows.name:
Some people just want to see the world drowned in a
tidal wave of chaos and hate. Is that so wrong?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0006
rows.name:
Oh, and before we fight, would you like me to kill a
few more of New LA's finest? Just to add to the drama,
you understand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0007
rows.name:
No, don't answer that. Let me answer it for you:
"Why, yes, I'd love you to kill Director General
Chausson." ...MINIONS! Bring the captive to me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0008
rows.name:
Kyaaaa ha ha ha! Oh, that's rich! If you could have 
seen the look on your face! Priceless, I tell you...
Anyway, question time is over.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0009
rows.name: Now you and I will settle this for good and all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0010
rows.name:
That is, if you can overcome the final weapon left by
the Definians...the Blood Despair![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0011
rows.name:
Heh... Victory is yours. I...knew it... Heeeee...
You really are the agent of justice I longed for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0012
rows.name: Surprised? You didn't see this coming, did you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_JNK0030
rows.name: Confess Surprise

rows.label: qev015103_SEL0031
rows.name: Admit that you never suspected Justin.

rows.label: qev015103_JNK0040
rows.name: Mock Him

rows.label: qev015103_SEL0041
rows.name: Laugh in Justin's face and say you knew all along.

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0013
rows.name:
High praise, I must say. Though that trusting nature is
all part of your heroic appeal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0014
rows.name:
Oh? Damn. Was it the laugh? Was that too much?
Should have just gone with "bwa ha ha" like all the
other villains...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0015
rows.name:
Or perhaps I just underestimated your keen powers of
observation. They are part of your heroic appeal,
after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0016
rows.name:
You're amazing, you know that? I'd even say...perfect.
Oh, my pulse is just racing right now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0017
rows.name:
I colluded with the Definians, planted bombs,
killed scores of innocent people, all for this moment![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0018
rows.name:
All to become a villain worthy of you.
To finally complete my story arc and earn the right
to be smitten by the forces of justice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0019
rows.name:
Now, what say we bring this story to a close?
The only one fit to drop the curtain is an avatar of
absolute good. ...You.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0020
rows.name:
Now end this! End the Blood Lobster's villainous plot
to plunge New LA into chaosâ€”bring down your
mighty hammer of justice![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_JNK0050
rows.name: Deploy the Hammer

rows.label: qev015103_SEL0051
rows.name: Execute your archenemy.

rows.label: qev015103_JNK0060
rows.name: Stay Your Hand

rows.label: qev015103_SEL0061
rows.name: Allow Justin to go free.

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0021
rows.name:
Yes... Yes! Those eyes! The steely resolve to smite evil in
all its forms! The realization that you will never be free
unless I am dispatched! I've...dreamed of this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0022
rows.name:
The circle is...c-complete.
My...t-tale has...reached its end...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0023
rows.name:
Wh-what? NO! I terrorized a city and killed innocent
people just so I could die by your hand![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0024
rows.name:
I leaked Definian weapons to criminals in New LA!
I incited them to perform horrible acts![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0025
rows.name:
I baited the disturbed into becoming mass murderers,
all to set the stage for my perfect climax of good
versus evil![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0026
rows.name:
Don't you see? I am your archenemy! The perfect evil!
Now, come. Dispatch me as you see fit. Fast? Slow?
I don't care. I only await your judgment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0027
rows.name:
Come on... Come on! WHY WON'T YOU KILL ME?!
If I don't die, my story can't end![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0028
rows.name:
Someone this brilliant and evil can't be left at large!
That's not how it WORKS! It can't be![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015103_MSG0029
rows.name: Rgh...nhh...! RAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAUGH![ST:wait ]
